author: Stereogum
title: Premature Evaluation: Sun Kil Moon Common As Light And Love Are Red Valleys Of Blood
text: Time for some game theory: Mark Kozelek is a closeted Twitter addict. I don't expect to see him get some kind of Ted Haggard-esque comeuppance where his private accounts are exposed and he's caught in the act of doing the exact, supposedly shameful thing he so staunchly advocated against. But for a guy who dedicates … More »
